overview: Lost in the blury transition that link adolescence to adulthood, Yan is engulfed in a spiral made of failure and loss. Between the care of a disabled mother, the disavowal of his girlfriend and the trouble he causes to Max, his best friend, the noose tightens around Yanâ€™s neck. Barely conscious of its own actions, clouded by desperation, Yan comes to ... commit the irreparable.
title: A FEATURE STORY
